name: IKE!Bun-Chan
description:
Oh no! Bun-Chan the bird is lost again, you must guide it to safety while preventing the street cat or sickening dog to feast on it.

There are two ways for you to guide Bun-Chan:

Voice Mode: Use your soul calming voice to make path for Bun-Chan.

Hand Manuver Mode: Point and Click the way for Bun-Chan

May you embrace the title of God of Bird and light Bun-Chan's way to it's home.

Enjoy!

          ------Credit------

Game Design = Khai & Mong

Artist/Sound Composer = Khai

Programmer = Mong
